players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I suspect Charlie of lying about me. He might be the mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. She knows I'm detective, so she will lie. We should vote her out."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafia. His claim that he investigated Alice and found her mafia is false. Alice’s claim that Charlie is detective is also false. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Alice and found her mafia. Alice knows I'm detective, so she'll lie. Bob, your claim I'm mafia is false. Vote Alice."
Bob: "Charlie claims he investigated Alice and found her mafia. If he's detective, that's true, so Alice is mafia. Alice claims Charlie is mafia, which would be false. So I vote Alice."
You: "text"
